TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IConvertible

summary.span: 定义将实现引用或值类型的值转换为具有等效值的公共语言运行时类型的方法。

span.span: Defines methods that convert the value of the implementing reference or value type to a common language runtime type that has an equivalent value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口提供方法的实现类型实例的值转换为具有等效值的公共语言运行时类型。This interface provides methods to convert the value of an instance of an implementing type to a common language runtime type that has an equivalent value. 公共语言运行时类型是， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The common language runtime types are , , , , , , , , , , , , , , and . 如果没有有意义的转换为公共语言运行时类型，则特定接口的方法实现将引发。If there is no meaningful conversion to a common language runtime type, then a particular interface method implementation throws . 例如，如果上一个布尔值实现此接口的类型、 的实现方法引发异常，因为没有不有意义等效于类型为 Boolean 类型。For example, if this interface is implemented on a Boolean type, the implementation of the method throws an exception because there is no meaningful equivalent to a Boolean type. 公共语言运行时通常公开接口通过类。The common language runtime typically exposes the interface through the class. 公共语言运行时还使用接口显示接口实现，来简化用于支持转换中的代码中的内部，类和基本的公共语言运行时类型。The common language runtime also uses the interface internally, in explicit interface implementations, to simplify the code used to support conversions in the class and basic common language runtime types. 除了接口，.NET Framework 提供了用于将用户定义的数据类型转换为其他数据类型中调用的类型转换器的类。In addition to the interface, the .NET Framework provides classes called type converters for converting user-defined data types to other data types. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通用类型转换](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada)主题。For more information, see the [Generalized Type Conversion](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada) topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现对于复数类，使其能够被强制转换为第一个，然后再调用静态成员上的。The following code sample demonstrates an implementation of for a Complex number class, allowing it to be cast first as a and then calling the static members on that . [!code-cpp[System.IConvertible#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IConvertible/CPP/iconvertible.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IConvertible#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IConvertible/CS/iconvertible.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IConvertible#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IConvertible/VB/iconvertible.vb#1)]

span.para: 如果你实现接口，您的实现将会自动调用方法如果参数是实现类型的实例和参数是公共语言运行时类型。大多数转换方法具有类型的参数，它表示当前区域性 () 或特定区域性。大多数情况下，的基类型实现忽略此参数。但是，你可以选择是否要在你的代码中使用它。

If you implement the interface, your implementation will be called automatically by the method if the parameter is an instance of your implementing type and the parameter is a common language runtime type. Most conversion methods have a parameter of type that represents either the current culture () or a specific culture. For the most part, the implementations of the base types ignore this parameter. However, you can choose whether to use it in your code.

param.name: provider
param.span: 接口实现，提供区域性特定的格式设置信息。

span.span: An interface implementation that supplies culture-specific formatting information.

summary.span: 使用指定的区域性特定格式设置信息将此实例的值转换为等效的 Boolean 值。

span.span: Converts the value of this instance to an equivalent Boolean value using the specified culture-specific formatting information.

returns.span: 与此实例的值等效的 Boolean 值。

span.span: A Boolean value equivalent to the value of this instance.
